forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
